mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NUM,REVIEW_NUM, REPLY_CONTENT,WRITER_EMAIL,REPLY_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE REVIEW_NUM=#{review_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET CONTENT=#{content} WHERE REVIEW_NUM=#{review_num} AND WRITER_EMAIL=#{writer_email};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE REVIEW_NUM=#{review_num} AND WRITER_EMAIL=#{writer_email};
